==Trivia==
===Etymology===
* {{Lang|{{w|Div (mythology)|''Dev''}}, or ''Div''|fa=دیو}}, are monsters in Middle Eastern mythology, particularly Persian.
** The people of Sumeru applied the term "Dev" to [[Abyss]]al monsters.<ref>{{Ref/Loading|Sumeru|quote=The dark beasts from beneath the earth were once referred to as "Dev" by the people of Sumeru.}}</ref><ref>{{Ref/HEO|Oracle Parchment, for the End of Death}}</ref>
